title: Problem with your Connection bug plz HELP
body: I am currently trying to log in and on launcher with lux face it constantly says there is a problem with your connection and to check support page...my Internet is fine this sucks because I want to play rank.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
So I have found the fix to your problems.

My thread should help. Read chat,

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/Bps5f2zp-anyones-client-not-working

This is caused by a live service incident that is still ongoing as of this moment. Reports are starting to wind down, so if you're still experiencing this issue, please [try a DNS flush](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq10), as it may resolve this for you as it has for some players. We're currently tracking this issue on [**this post.
**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/yjteaUkU-login-issues-all-regions-127)

Let me know if you have any questions.
